snippet: The State Supreme Court said late Wednesday that it would take up the legal challenge to the pardons approved by Gov. Haley Barbour before he left office, scheduling a hearing for Feb. 9.
abstract: Mississippi State Supreme Court will take up the legal challenge to the pardons approved by Gov Haley Barbour before he left office.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court said late Wednesday that it would take up the legal challenge to the pardons approved by Gov. Haley Barbour before he left office, scheduling a hearing for Feb. 9.

headline.main: Mississippi: Court Takes Up Challenge to Pardons
headline.print_headline: Court to Take Up Pardons Challenge
